PACS (Picture Archiving & Communication System)
Purpose: Enterprise imaging archive and delivery platform for diagnostic images.
Core Modules & Functions:
• Image Storage & Retrieval: Vendor-neutral archive (VNA), de-duplication, compression options • Viewing & Distribution: Web-based viewers, zero-footprint viewer, mobile access • Workflow Management: Hanging protocols, worklists, peer review and annotation tools • Integration & Analytics: DICOM routing, modality worklist, integration with RIS and EHR; 3D post-processing
Architecture & Integration:
• DICOM-compliant storage with scalable object stores; FHIR ImagingStudy resources for EHR links • Integrates with advanced visualization suites (e.g., 3D reconstructions, AI-driven triage)
Example Software Highlights:
• Sectra PACS: High-speed streaming, multi-modality support, integrated clinical collaboration platform • GE Centricity PACS: Automated hanging protocols, advanced breast imaging, Mammo scripting
